title.rendered: Displaced Palestinian families shelter among the ruins of their homes

caption.rendered: La Unrwa afirmó que las tiendas de campaña empapadas hacen que las condiciones de vida de los deplazados sean aún más peligrosas. Foto EFE

image_meta.caption: GAZA CITY (---), 10/12/2025.- Makeshift tents of displaced Palestinians among the ruins of destroyed buildings east of Gaza City, 10 December 2025, amid a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas. Around 1.9 million people in Gaza, nearly 90 percent of the population, have been displaced since the Israel-Hamas conflict began in October 2023, according to the UN. EFE/EPA/MOHAMMED SABER
